text: @WhiteHouse FRANKLY, IF ALL GOVERNORS, MAYORS, REPS,THE SENATE & DOCTORS HAVE HELPED PRES.TRUMP WITH CONVICTION & HONESTY NOT POLITICAL IT WOULD HAVE BEEN SMOOTH FIGHT FOR COVID19 & PERHAPS LESS PEOPLE DIED.HOWEVER, IF THE ENEMY SPREAD BIG AMOUNT OF VIRUS AS INTENDED THEN IT IS ANOTHER STORY
